text: Dude,you keep bringing us awesome video game themes we wanna hear so thank you. You even found rare ones that made me wanna find the game to play it. You deserve a ton of thanks.

text: You deserve it man, your channel always brings back memories of my childhood with all the great games back then. Keep it up and hope those money hungry companies don't close down your channel.

text:
